summary: Carriage Refurbishment / Replacer - Dibella Theme Retexture 2048x2048 Gold / Ebony / Moonstone
descriptionHtml:
Carriage Refurbishment / Replacer - Dibella Theme Retexture 2048x2048 Gold / Ebony / Moonstone

Usual Drill for a replacer: extract to SkyRim Game Install Folder (ensuring data folder is merged with existing data folder), move elsewhere (the .nif files in meshes\\Furniture\\Cart) or delete them to uninstall.
I\'ll add another one for the Intro Prisoner Carriage also soon.

It\'s the first mod i\'ve uploaded, so let me know if any problems, but i think it should be pretty well right. 

Wouldn\'t have thought too much could go wrong with that.
I didn\'t include the Normal Texture Mapping Files which i left as the default (besides the 
Dibella part that is) I\'d imagine that the game engine will be able to locate them in the 
default locations within the SkyRim-Textures.bsa
Should be compatible with all other mods unless they specifically alter the Carriage in other 

ways.
author: philbydorro
